title: IFRS & GAPSME Disclosure Checklist
description: Disclosure requirements for IFRS and GAPSME financial statements with applicability toggles.

items.text: Present statement of financial position, profit or loss, cash flows, and changes in equity.
Ensure comparative information for prior period and opening balances when restated.
Confirm cash flow statement exemption (GAPSME) assessed and documented if omitted.
Disclose significant accounting policies, judgements, and estimation uncertainty.
Disclose new standards issued but not yet effective and expected impact.
Provide categories, measurement bases, and fair value hierarchy for financial instruments.
Disclose qualitative and quantitative risk information (credit, liquidity, market).
For GAPSME, disclose financial instrument classes and valuation methods.
Reconcile tax expense to accounting profit and disclose deferred tax components.
Where GAPSME exemption taken, document rationale and notify stakeholders.
Disclose non-cash movements in financing liabilities (IAS 7).
Include related party balances and transactions per IAS 24.
If applicable, present results and cash flows for discontinued operations.
